snippet: Kenny’s Castaways will go silent this week, becoming the latest in a lengthening list of Manhattan music sites to close because of rising costs and dwindling audiences.
abstract: Kenny's Castaways, cavernous music club on Bleecker Street in Greenwich Village, is closing after 36 years of showcasing diverse, up-and-coming talent; club joins a growing list of New York City music venues closing due to rising costs and dwindling audiences.
lead_paragraph: Kenny’s Castaways will go silent this week, becoming the latest in a lengthening list of Manhattan music sites to close because of rising costs and dwindling audiences.

headline.seo: Kenny’s Castaways, Greenwich Village Music Club, Is Closing
headline.main: After Decades of Acts Like Patti Smith and the Fugees, Silence for a Village Club
headline.print_headline: After Decades of Acts Like Patti Smith and the Fugees, Silence for a Village Club
